_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The causal chain of how the entire mass: Support for the continuation of consciousness
The six sense fields are conditions for contact
Contact is a condition for feeling
Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress come to be
Support for the continuation of consciousness
The six sense fields are conditions for contact
Contact is a condition for feeling
Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress come to be
No support for the continuation of consciousness
Name and form are not conceived
Old age and death, sorrow, lamentation, pain, sadness, and distress cease.
